title: Death Note Rewrite 2 L's successors English Subs HD (810p)
description:
Hi all,

This is Death Note Rewrite 2 L's successors English Subs HD version.

Thanks to the following for the English Subs:
BlueDragon 
Translation script, Editing, Timing, Encoding.
Leopharry
Translator, Editing.
PsychoBob
Editing, Quality assurance.

Three of us tried the best we could to bring you this fansub as no one else would do the work. It took us over 2 weeks to translate this from French to English if we made any errors we are sorry we tied our best to make it as error free and enjoyable as possible, but we are human and make mistakes.

Note: This is the second Director's cut also know as:

Overview:
A sequel to the previous "Death Note Rewrite." This story continues where the previous left off, continuing the story of Light. As the previous special told Light and L's battles, this story specifically, recount the final half of the supernatural suspense story, including the investigators Near and Mello's confrontations with the vigilante Kira.

Please leave comments helpful to others and seed once finished :D
